StatDef.label: weapon ranged DPS
StatDef.description: Maximum potential damage dealt per second in ranged combat at the optimal range of this weapon.\n\nThis stat doesn't factor in the shooter's skill or target defenses like cover and armor, so the actual value will be lower.

StatDef.label: max ranged DPS
StatDef.description: Maximum potential damage dealt per second in ranged combat, assuming all shots were to hit.\n\nThis stat doesn't factor in accuracy or target defenses like cover and armor, so the actual value will be lower.

StatDef.label: ranged DPS
StatDef.description: Average damage per second in ranged combat, factoring in both the weapon and the shooter's skills.\n\nThis stat doesn't factor in target defenses like cover and armor.

StatDef.label: weapon ranged DPS
StatDef.description: Maximum potential damage dealt per second in ranged combat at the optimal range of this turret's weapon.\n\nThis stat doesn't factor in the turret's shooting accuracy or target defenses like cover and armor, so the actual value will be lower.

StatDef.label: max ranged damage per second
StatDef.description: Maximum potential damage dealt per second in ranged combat, assuming all shots were to hit.\n\nThis stat doesn't factor in accuracy or target defenses like cover and armor, so the actual value will be lower.
